basics.name: Amir Ali Jiwani
basics.label: Software Craftsman
basics.summary:
A software enthusiast.

I have been working as a developer for around a decade. During this time, I have got a chance to visit various domains and technologies -- Which helped in shaping my self on how I think and work now.

I like to create software and helping other developers like me around. Recently have gained interest in making more layman talks than the development intensive, as I believe everyone attached to a concept should have a right to understand it in complete and concise way.

Some recent technologies I have been working are NodeJS, React, Docker, Kubernetes, Electron and other of such kind. My main focus is towards the problem solving, irrespective of the platform.

location.address: A1-17-03, Vista Komanwel A, Jalan Jalil Perkasa 19

work.name: SEEK
work.description: Solving the problem of connecting the right candidate to the needful hirers
work.summary: SEEK is a diverse group of companies that have a unified purpose to help people live more fulfilling and productive working lives and help organisations succeed.
highlights: Contributed to SEEKs overall product & technology strategy and aligning systems with that strategy.
Ensured that systems are fit for purpose, well architected and follow current SEEK development practices.
Maintained platform health, by ensuring that our systems are secure, reliable, resilient and cost effective.
Drove customer focus to ensure that we are delivering great outcomes for our customers.
Commenced and maintained a high performing team culture that values collaboration, learning and continual improvement.
Acted as an enabler; Growing the technical skills and leadership capabilities of my team through coaching and mentoring. This involves having 1:1s with my team mates.
Lead by example; Which required me to get my hands dirty when the need is there.
Unblocked the team with what ever it took, having the complete ownership in the matters of maintaining healthy teams.
Celebrated successes and learnt from the failures; And propogated the culture through the teams and examplified it for the rest of the organization.
Paired with the Pricipal Engineer of the team, to understand the climate and the problems of the team.
Participated in and retroed the core hiring process through centralized hiring squad in the organization.

work.name: SEEK
work.description: Solving the problem of connecting the right candidate to the needful hirers
work.summary: SEEK is a diverse group of companies that have a unified purpose to help people live more fulfilling and productive working lives and help organisations succeed.
highlights: Been the catalyst for transforming the organization.
Performed the duties as the JavaScript coach for the organization.
Advocated for, and implemented software best practices.
Been the communicator for various teams to maintain their health; Some times preached the organization values.
Participated as a core in hiring new and experienced talents.
Propagated automation as a culture rather an option.
Moved legacy code and data to cloud via lift & shift, green field and brown field methodologies.
Performed the duties of deciding and validating sensible defaults for the organization.
Pushed cloud first approach in the org, living in an environment of Infra ops.

work.name: Exact
work.description: Cloud business software for SMEs and their accountants
work.summary: We are Exact. We make smart business software. We are entrepreneurial and dream big, just like you. We help and encourage anyone we work with to always be the best version of themselves.
highlights: Helped to come up with an end-to-end pipeline to build and release the product.
Performed various tasks including coding, building, testing, releasing and debugging the product.
Made massive use of automation, including development and in release cycles.
Helped to produce tools that are helpful during the lifecycle of the product. Usually as a need to support the product.
Helped POC the product initially with our customers to set up our product owner for the success of the product.

work.name: Hexosys
work.description: Albaloo is a fast growing location based advertising platform, consists of Mobile App, Web Portal, Social Media Fan Pages and 3rd Party Advertising Partners.
work.summary: Accomplishing more than 150 main products as cutting-edge technology protocol/bus analyzers, reveals great ability of HexoSys to delivering new projects within the field of expertise with complete maturity and high competitive to the global high-tech market.
highlights: Helped in complete overhaul and rewriting parts of the Albaloo product.
Added the ability of targetting users through multi communication channels (SMS, emails, mobile notifications etc).
Helped product with identifying with and implementing the ability of geo fencing the ads in the current platform.
Introduced a custom framework on top of Laravel's current implementation to support custom JavaScript loading in the layout.
Initialized and laid the basis for automation in the project; Through simplifying and making some tedious task, process oriented.

work.name: Pi-Labs
work.description: A service provider for various kinds of software needs to our clients.
work.summary: Our passion for mobile software and our ability to deliver engaging solutions has given us much acclaim. Early adoption of Windows Phone 7 meant we were one of the first companies globally to have delivered an app to the Microsoft Marketplace, yet our expertise encompasses the breadth of the smartphone ecosystems including iOS, Android and Palm’s WebOS.
